item.title: Please help on making this work. It will pay off
item.dc:creator: @iceman327 iceman327
item.description:
@iceman327 wrote:

[quote=“montalvom, post:1, topic:148611”]ok, this is what I need help with.

case 33223://wcing sendFrame171(1, 2465); sendFrame171(0, 2468); sendFrame126("What would you like to do?", 2460); sendFrame126("Train this skill", 2461); sendFrame126("Read skill menu", 2462); sendFrame164(2459); NpcDialogueSend = true; break;

You see where it says “train this skill”?
how can I make it so if you click on Train this skill it teles you to 2702 3424
and if you click on Read skill menu it opens up a skill menu?[/quote]

im not sure about clicking on the thing
but make it say to train this skill type ::wc
or something

Read full topic
item.source: Please help on making this work. It will pay off

item.title: Please help on making this work. It will pay off
item.dc:creator: @montalvom montalvom
item.description:
@montalvom wrote:

[quote="[Mike"]link=topic=203782.msg1797337#msg1797337 date=1191404771]
No, it doesn’t… Let me download a source… I forgot the exact case number.

Search for

case 9157:

this wont work. I need 2 seperate one’s, one for tele and one for opening skill menu.

Add this in it

					[code]} else if (NpcDialogue == 33223) { //whatever
						NpcDialogue = 0;
						NpcDialogueSend = false;
						teleportToX = 2702;
                                                    teleportToY = 3424;
                                                    sendMessage("You teleport to ..........");
                                                    }

[/code][/quote]

EDIT: I just added but when I click on wcing it says train this skill read skill menu and i click both of them nothing happens.

Read full topic

item.title: Please help on making this work. It will pay off

case 33223://wcing sendFrame171(1, 2465); sendFrame171(0, 2468); sendFrame126("What would you like to do?", 2460); sendFrame126("Train this skill", 2461); sendFrame126("Read skill menu", 2462); sendFrame164(2459); NpcDialogueSend = true; break;

You see where it says “train this skill”?
how can I make it so if you click on Train this skill it teles you to 2702 3424
and if you click on Read skill menu it opens up a skill menu?
